paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician upon Nehiloth, A Psalm of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician upon Nehiloth, A Psalm of David.

paragraphs.content: Give ear to my words, O LORD, consider my meditation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Give ear to my words, O Lord, consider my meditation.

paragraphs.content: Hearken unto the voice of my cry, my King, and my God: for unto thee will I pray.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hearken unto the voice of my cry, my King, and my God: for unto thee will I pray.

paragraphs.content: My voice shalt thou hear in the morning, O LORD; in the morning will I direct my prayer unto thee, and will look up.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My voice shalt thou hear in the morning, O Lord; in the morning will I direct my prayer unto thee, and will look up.

paragraphs.content: For thou art not a God that hath pleasure in wickedness: neither shall evil dwell with thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thou art not a God that hath pleasure in wickedness: neither shall evil dwell with thee.

paragraphs.content: The foolish shall not stand in thy sight: thou hatest all workers of iniquity.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The foolish shall not stand in thy sight: thou hatest all workers of iniquity.

paragraphs.content: Thou shalt destroy them that speak leasing: the LORD will abhor the bloody and deceitful man.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou shalt destroy them that speak leasing: the Lord will abhor the bloody and deceitful man.

paragraphs.content: But as for me, I will come into thy house in the multitude of thy mercy: and in thy fear will I worship toward thy holy temple.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But as for me, I will come into thy house in the multitude of thy mercy: and in thy fear will I worship toward thy holy temple.

paragraphs.content: Lead me, O LORD, in thy righteousness because of mine enemies; make thy way straight before my face.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lead me, O Lord, in thy righteousness because of mine enemies; make thy way straight before my face.

paragraphs.content: For there is no faithfulness in their mouth; their inward part is very wickedness; their throat is an open sepulchre; they flatter with their tongue.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For there is no faithfulness in their mouth; their inward part is very wickedness; their throat is an open sepulchre; they flatter with their tongue.

paragraphs.content: Destroy thou them, O God; let them fall by their own counsels; cast them out in the multitude of their transgressions; for they have rebelled against thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Destroy thou them, O God; let them fall by their own counsels; cast them out in the multitude of their transgressions; for they have rebelled against thee.

paragraphs.content: But let all those that put their trust in thee rejoice: let them ever shout for joy, because thou defendest them: let them also that love thy name be joyful in thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But let all those that put their trust in thee rejoice: let them ever shout for joy, because thou defendest them: let them also that love thy name be joyful in thee.

paragraphs.content: For thou, LORD, wilt bless the righteous; with favour wilt thou compass him as with a shield.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thou, Lord, wilt bless the righteous; with favour wilt thou compass him as with a shield.
